dc_title_s: Colton's map of the United States of America, the British provinces, Mexico and the West Indies : showing the country from the Atlantic to the Pacific Ocean
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Prime meridians: Greenwich, Washington.; Insets: The eastern portion of the West India Islands.|94 x 108 centimeters|Scale 1:5,274,720; 83.25 miles = 1 inch.|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: G.W. and C.B. Colton & Co (New York)
